name: part_007
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei Live Tour 2024 ＂Spectra of Nova＂ [eWqiZHIoOjk]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Hoshimachi Suisei performs the song 'Template' at her live tour 'Spectra of Nova'.
Hoshimachi Suisei performs the song 'Bibideba' at her live tour 'Spectra of Nova'.

subtitles.original: ...あげてる
subtitles.english: ...screaming.

subtitles.original: ふんばり けったり 注意散漫人生の点呼
subtitles.english: Struggling and kicking, a roll call of a distracted life.

subtitles.original: 新しい 時代を乗りこなしていくんだ
subtitles.english: I'm going to ride out this new era.

subtitles.original: 透明で 鮮明で 叫び声あげてる
subtitles.english: Transparent, vivid, and letting out a scream.

subtitles.original: 前のめり つのり 失敗しては学んでいく
subtitles.english: Leaning forward, intensifying, learning from every failure.

subtitles.original: もうこのままずっと降り止まない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: It's a world of rain that won't stop falling like this anymore.

subtitles.original: 愛するしかない それしかない 器用じゃないから
subtitles.english: I have no choice but to love, that's all I have, because I'm not clumsy.

subtitles.original: そう白紙になった青春の何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: Yeah, which page of my youth that turned into a blank sheet was it?

subtitles.original: 忘れ物思い出せないまま 忘れそう
subtitles.english: Unable to remember what I've forgotten, I feel like I'll forget it all.

subtitles.original: このままじゃ...
subtitles.english: At this rate...

subtitles.original: 青空の形 見えない 見えないよ あなたが
subtitles.english: I can't see the shape of the blue sky, I can't see it, or you.

subtitles.original: あなただって同じ じっとなんてしてられない
subtitles.english: You're the same, you can't just stand still.

subtitles.original: 動き出すよ この身かけて こぼさないよ
subtitles.english: I'm starting to move, risking this body, I won't let it spill.

subtitles.original: 泣いたってしょうがないさ
subtitles.english: It's no use crying anyway.

subtitles.original: ねえこのままずっと降り止まない雨の世界だ
subtitles.english: Hey, it's a world of rain that won't stop falling like this.

subtitles.original: もう悲しくない 人はなれる生き物だから
subtitles.english: I'm not sad anymore, because humans are creatures that can adapt.

subtitles.original: そう白紙になった青春の何ページ目だったっけ
subtitles.english: Yeah, which page of my youth that turned into a blank sheet was it?

subtitles.original: 今君に会いたいと涙こらえて
subtitles.english: Now, holding back tears as I want to see you.

subtitles.original: サヨナラだ サヨナラだって 認めたくないけど
subtitles.english: It's goodbye, even if I don't want to admit it's goodbye.

subtitles.original: 雨上がりのこの世界が 眩しいから
subtitles.english: Because this world after the rain is so bright.

subtitles.original: もう帰らない 振り返らない 思い出とともに
subtitles.english: I won't go back, I won't look back, along with the memories.

subtitles.original: 新しい風にあおられ そしてまた
subtitles.english: Buffeted by a new wind, and then again...

subtitles.original: 君に会いたいと願い
subtitles.english: ...wishing to see you.

subtitles.original: 駆けてゆく
subtitles.english: I'll run on.

subtitles.original: 駆けてゆく
subtitles.english: I'll run on.

subtitles.original: もっちょっぴっ 乙に合いますか 甘ったるいだけじゃ満足しないで
subtitles.english: Just a little bit more, does it suit your taste? Don't be satisfied with just sweetness.

subtitles.original: さあ回って首できてんの?
subtitles.english: Now spin around, is your neck ready?

subtitles.original: じゃ Time is up Time is up
subtitles.english: Then, time is up, time is up!

subtitles.original: いくぞ埼玉! Ready? One, two, three!
subtitles.english: Let's go, Saitama! Ready? One, two, three!

subtitles.original: めめめめでこんな後先と 右往左往しても人間だっか
subtitles.english: Even if I'm confused about the consequences, back and forth, I'm still human, right?

subtitles.original: そう一辺倒しても体勢OK 明日もセオリー
subtitles.english: Even if I'm single-minded, my posture is OK, tomorrow is also a theory.

subtitles.original: ああもう鬱陶しい ノイズさらっていい夢 聞いたことない爆音で
subtitles.english: Ah, it's so annoying, sweep away the noise for a good dream with a roar you've never heard.

subtitles.original: チリみたいな誇りっぽいの 急いで手放したいね
subtitles.english: I want to hurry up and let go of this dust-like pride.

subtitles.original: 不条理な善よりもでかいのくれ 私にステージをくれ
subtitles.english: Give me something bigger than absurd goodness, give me a stage.

subtitles.original: Let's get up Step into the place
subtitles.english: Let's get up, step into the place!

subtitles.original: 好きに踊りたいんだ
subtitles.english: I want to dance however I like.

subtitles.original: 特権階級なんて大層なこと言ってないの 的、射て 的、射して
subtitles.english: I'm not saying anything grand like 'privileged class', just shoot the target, pierce the target.

subtitles.original: あーは 前例ないくらいに 燃やしちゃいたいなって
subtitles.english: Ah-ha, I want to burn it all down like never before.

subtitles.original: 狭い部屋の中だって硬い心臓に 膨張してるんだろう
subtitles.english: Even in a small room, it's probably expanding in a hard heart.

subtitles.original: Ah...
subtitles.english: Ah...

subtitles.original: 限界点にブーストして 順序は問うの滑稽で
subtitles.english: Boost to the limit, it's ridiculous to ask the order.

subtitles.original: 皮肉なほどに狂うものなの 知らないな ちょっとバイバイ 狼煙を上げろ派手に
subtitles.english: It's ironically a crazy thing, I don't know, bye-bye, raise the signal fire flamboyantly.

subtitles.original: 世界の真ん中へ
subtitles.english: To the center of the world.

subtitles.original: メメモリ乗り越えてベッドして 受け止め切るはずないな
subtitles.english: Overcoming the memento mori, betting on it, there's no way I can take it all in.

subtitles.original: 共依存の際限は多分気まぐれ
subtitles.english: The limit of codependency is probably a whim.

subtitles.original: じゃあどんだけなんだって最高潮 Q&A ばっか
subtitles.english: So how much is it, the climax, just Q&A.

subtitles.original: 何時 私の全身全霊を知れ
subtitles.english: Always, know my whole heart and soul.

subtitles.original: 迷いはない 今夜 嘘が手の世界に 的、射て 的、射して あばれろ
subtitles.english: There's no hesitation tonight, in a world of lies, shoot the target, pierce the target, run wild.

subtitles.original: 前例ないけど 燃やし尽くしちゃえば 赤くなるだけなんだから
subtitles.english: There's no precedent, but if you burn it all down, it'll just turn red.
